302.procedure: Police can arrest without warrant. Bail usually granted only by court.
302.punishment: Murder — life imprisonment or death penalty.

420.description: Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property
420.procedure: Court may grant bail depending on circumstances.
420.punishment: Cheating — imprisonment up to 7 years and fine.

41A.description: Notice of appearance before police officer
41A.punishment: No punishment. It is a procedural notice.

323.procedure: Bail can be obtained from police station.
323.punishment: punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to one year, or with fine which may extend to one thousand rupees, or with both

379.procedure: Police can investigate without court order.
379.punishment: Theft — imprisonment up to 3 years or fine or both.

354.procedure: Court decides bail depending on case facts.
354.punishment: Assault or criminal force against woman — imprisonment up to 5 years.
